scripts.bitcoin:setup: npm run docker:up && npm run bitcoin:wait && npm run bitcoin:init
scripts.bitcoin:wait: timeout 30 bash -c 'until docker exec caravan-e2e-bitcoind bitcoin-cli -regtest getblockchaininfo; do sleep 1; done'
scripts.bitcoin:init: docker exec caravan-e2e-bitcoind bitcoin-cli -regtest generatetoaddress 101 $(docker exec caravan-e2e-bitcoind bitcoin-cli -regtest getnewaddress)
